Welcome!

b2evolution is a professional blog engine. It supports multiple blogs, edited by multiple users and in multiple languages. Plus, it's free, it's open-source (GPL) and it runs virtually anywhere (PHP 4 / MySQL 3.23)!

You will find complete information on the official b2evolution website.

WARNING: This is a BETA release. There are still bugs we know of, but we consider the software is globally operational! :->

NOTE: This version is and will continue to be fully supported in the upgrading scheme and procedures.

Quickstart instructions:

You can set up b2evolution in just a few minutes. Just follow the instructions matching your situation:

  • Installing b2evolution from scratch
  • Upgrading from a previous version of b2evolution
  • Upgrading from other blog software:
    • Cafelog/b2
    • Movable Type
